metadata.Title: CVE-2023-3153 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in Open Virtual Network where the service monitor MAC does not properly rate limit. This issue could allow an attacker to cause a denial of service, including on deployments with CoPP enabled and properly configured.

criterions.comment: ovn: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'change too intrusive').
